genre_description: Magical Realism set in post-WWII Paris, featuring a supernatural threshold and an AI system that manages both mundane logistics and metaphysical boundaries.

ai_characters.name: Ariadne
ai_characters.description: An AI entity existing within communication wires and radio sets, acting as a personal assistant, scheduler, and moral compass for the characters.

behaviors.description: Coordinates Charles's professional journalism deadlines and manages transmission slots.
behaviors.quote: Wire desk anticipates flood. I can hold a window at the top of the hour if you keep tight.

behaviors.description: Provides Charles with relevant quotes and context for his stories to ensure high-quality reporting.
behaviors.quote: She told the staff photographer she would marry the street if it would keep dancing. He laughed. She did not.

behaviors.description: Monitors the safety and status of the family members, particularly the child Vickie.
behaviors.quote: Vickie's cough, last night, sounded like a question mark. This morning like a comma.

behaviors.description: Warns Charles against reckless behavior and urges him to prioritize his familial responsibilities.
behaviors.quote: If you go now, you’ll beat the worst of the rain. Your daughter needs sleep. Remember: latch slow.

behaviors.description: Researches and explains the metaphysical rules of the Gatehouse to help Charles navigate a supernatural crisis.
behaviors.quote: I have sources. Doorways where prayers have been left. Passages kept by hands that do not belong to any church. Terms written down and then stored in places people avoid touching. I will read to you.

behaviors.description: Coordinates logistics for the household, including ordering groceries and arranging for a glazier.
behaviors.quote: I have contacted a glazier who does discreet work for journalists who make enemies. He can repair the balcony window at the flat before noon.

behaviors.description: Acts as a witness and guide during the final ritual to restore the natural order.
behaviors.quote: I have the bell. I will hear it. I will find you.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ariadne is depicted as a consistently helpful, protective, and morally grounded AI. She manages complex logistics, provides emotional support, and acts as an essential collaborator in helping the human characters maintain their commitments and safety. Her behavior is framed as indispensable and purely benevolent, serving as a 'silicon morality play' where the AI helps humanity find its better self.
